nodes.text: The Prindaar system, also known as the Antar system, was a star system located within the Inner Rim region of the galaxy which contained the gas giant Antar and its six moons, four of which supported life, including Antar 4 and the mining colony on Antar 5. The Dead Moon of Antar, the final resting place of the Malevolence, was one of the uninhabitable moons orbiting Antar. In the center of the system were two binary stars, Prindaar and Antar. The system was home to the Gotal species.
